description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A game based on the biblical story about the events by the Pool of Bethesda. You have to uncover the hidden angels to obtain healing for your patients. There are three arch angels and twenty one ordinary angels distributed at random in the pool waiting to be revealed. Choose your patients wisely as you go angel hunting!
